short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional features for SIS 2.0 - Caterpillar Web Application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is made only for SIS 2.0 - Caterpillar Web Application.

*Place the cursor on the cart icon to show the popup cart.

Features:
1. Grouping cart item with custom tag
2. Copy cart item into table form
3. Export to CSV file

CHANGELOG
================
Version 1.1
- Fixed issue: deleting items on the shopping cart page does not affect the extension data
Version 1.2
- Fixed issue: there was an update of the SIS2 Web Application that made the extension not work properly
Version 1.3
- Fixed issue: group number selection method
